title: Energy Management Plan
description:
Staff presented the City's 2026 Energy Management Plan, which sets targets for reducing municipal building energy use, fleet electrification, and community-wide emissions. The plan aligns with provincial climate goals and supports the City's climate action commitments.

Actions: Council approved the 2026 Energy Management Plan and directed staff to report back on implementation progress in one year.
decision: Council approved the 2026 Energy Management Plan and directed staff to report back on implementation progress in one year.
